# Voyage GEO

> SEO analytics for AI search engines. Measures how ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Perplexity, DeepSeek, Grok, and Llama reference your brand.

## Install

pip install voyage-geo
voyage-geo install-skills

## Agent Instructions

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/onvoyage-ai/voyage-geo-agent/main/AGENTS.md

## Docs

https://github.com/onvoyage-ai/voyage-geo-agent/blob/main/README.md
